testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlFullEventUpdateRequest dialog as an EC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.4.3 [Need for Planned Event Information] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Authentication is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R60_Authentication_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R60_Authentication_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Requesting Organization is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R61_Requesting_Organization_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R61_Requesting_Organization_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Unique Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.3.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R62_Event_Unique_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R62_Event_Unique_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Response Plan Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.3.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R63_Event_Response_Plan_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R63_Event_Response_Plan_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Category Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.3.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R64_Event_Category_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R64_Event_Category_Filter_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Priority Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.3.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R65_Event_Priority_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R65_Event_Priority_Filter_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Description Confidence Level Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.3.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R66_Event_Description_Confidence_Level_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R66_Event_Description_Confidence_Level_Filter_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Access Level Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.3.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R67_Event_Access_Level_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R67_Event_Access_Level_Filter_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Action Flag Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.3.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R68_Event_Action_Flag_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R68_Event_Action_Flag_Filter_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Severity Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.3.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R69_Event_Severity_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R69_Event_Severity_Filter_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether External Center Organization Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.3.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R70_External_Center_Organization_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R70_External_Center_Organization_Filter_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Location Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.3.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R71_Event_Location_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R71_Event_Location_Filter_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Request Start Time Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.3.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R72_Request_Start_Time_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R72_Request_Start_Time_Filter_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Request End Time Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.4.3.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N8R73_Request_End_Time_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N8R73_Request_End_Time_Filter_Supported}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: Define the response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: ResponseMessage: ${ResponseMessage}
Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 18 CONFIGURE: Identify the Username expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Username: ${Username}
Step 19 CONFIGURE: Identify the Password expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Password: ${Password}
Step 20 CONFIGURE: Identify the Organization Identifier expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: OrganizationID: ${OrganizationID}
Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 23 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}
Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT is expected to have valid data available for a response message in this test. RECORD this information as: DataValid: ${DataValid}

Step 25 REQUEST-RESPONSE-OC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlFullEventUpdateRequest AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck USERNAME = Username PASSWORD = Password ORGANIZATIONID = OrganizationID ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected DATAVALID = DataValid
Step 26 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.1 IF TMDD_N8R60_Authentication_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.1.1 VERIFY that element authentication exists within eventRequestMsg
Step 26.2 IF TMDD_N8R61_Requesting_Organization_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.2.1 VERIFY that element organization-requesting exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-header
Step 26.3 IF TMDD_N8R62_Event_Unique_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.3.1 VERIFY that element request-focus exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-type
Step 26.3.2 VERIFY that element event-ids exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-type
Step 26.4 IF TMDD_N8R63_Event_Response_Plan_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.4.1 VERIFY that element response-plan-ids exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-type
Step 26.5 IF TMDD_N8R64_Event_Category_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.5.1 VERIFY that element category exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-filters.request-filter
Step 26.6 IF TMDD_N8R65_Event_Priority_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.6.1 VERIFY that element priority-level exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-filters.request-filter
Step 26.7 IF TMDD_N8R66_Event_Description_Confidence_Level_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.7.1 VERIFY that element confidence-level exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-filters.request-filter
Step 26.8 IF TMDD_N8R67_Event_Access_Level_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.8.1 VERIFY that element access-level exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-filters.request-filter
Step 26.9 IF TMDD_N8R68_Event_Action_Flag_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.9.1 VERIFY that element action-request-flag exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-filters.request-filter
Step 26.10 IF TMDD_N8R69_Event_Severity_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.10.1 VERIFY that element severity exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-filters.request-filter
Step 26.11 IF TMDD_N8R70_External_Center_Organization_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.11.1 VERIFY that element organizations-requested exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-filters.request-filter
Step 26.12 IF TMDD_N8R71_Event_Location_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.12.1 VERIFY that element request-locations exists within eventRequestMsg
Step 26.13 IF TMDD_N8R72_Request_Start_Time_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.13.1 VERIFY that element start-time exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-times
Step 26.14 IF TMDD_N8R73_Request_End_Time_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.14.1 VERIFY that element end-time exists within each instance of eventRequestMsg.request-times
Step 26.15 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 26.16 CONFIGURE: Set OptionalContentVerified to True
Step 26.17 POSTCONDITION: REQUEST-RESPONSE-OC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlFullEventUpdateRequest OPTIONALCONTENTVERIFIED = OptionalContentVerified RESPONSEMESSAGE = ResponseMessage
